name: Playoff Challenge for the NHL
description:
Some call it the greatest game on earth.

No matter how you feel about the game, nobody can argue the unique balance of toughness and elegance the game of Hockey requires.

Test yourself in the following growing categories:

Original Six Teams
Championships
Greatest Players
Goalies & Coaches
Refs & Rulebooks

√ Simple, instant fun!
Super easy to get started.

√ Addictive, big fun!
Learning inside information and fun facts about your favorite players and teams.

√ Continuous updates, everlasting fun!
We are currently sourcing more trivia all the time! Make sure to update your app for more trivia.

√ Play with friends, shared fun!
